channel.title: Unable to buy from shops
channel.description:
Hey, I'm relatively new to coding and I recently made a Donator Shop and added all the items in it but when i try and buy the items I am unable to this also is happening with my general store. Any possible answers why this is happening? The base i'm using is Luckyscape
Thanks Roflmfao

item.title: Unable to buy from shops
item.dc:creator: @roflmfao roflmfao
item.description:
@roflmfao wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:393907”][quote author=roflmfao link=topic=491091.msg3591165#msg3591165 date=1304644908]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=491091.msg3591100#msg3591100 date=1304642092]

ok il try be more specific:

I made the donator store, added all the items and prices, but when i click buy 1x bandos godsword i dont get the item in my inventory.
Hopefully thats a little more specific.
[/quote]In shops cfg make sure the shop is set to buy and sell both. 1 and 1 I believe it is.

All of them are set to 2 and 2 so i changed the gen store to 1 and 1 and nothing changed
[/quote]does your store use special donor points or coins?[/quote]

Nope the shop just uses regular coins.

Read full topic
